title: Did a study confirm that humans can literally feed on each other's energy?
subtitle: The living allegations about the ability of humans to sense and feed each other's emotional energy are the result of a comic reading of a pilot study on algae.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A pilot study showing that algae can derive an alternative source of energy from other plants suggests that humans may be able to extract energy from each other in a similar way.
